info.name: Assessment - TESTDB
info.description:
Include the following security Basic Authorization upon each request:

#### **Authorization: Basic Auth**

**Username**: TESTDB  
**Password**: Test1234

item.name: CREATE

request.description:
# **Request Fields**

# **Object Array**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Compulsory** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| lastName | String | Y | Customer Last Name |
| firstName | String | Y | Customer First Name |
| address | String |  | Customer address |
| postcode | String |  | Customer postcode |
| city | String |  | Customer city |
| state | String |  | Customer state |
| country | String |  | Customer country |
| email | String | Y | Customer personal email |
| contact | String |  | Customer contact no |
| joinDate | String |  | Customer join date |
| card | Object Array |  | Card Info |

# **card (Optional)**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| no | String | Card No |
| type | String | Type of card (e.g. M/V stand for Mastercard or Visa) |

# **Response Fields**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| content | Object |  |
| messages | String\[\] |  |
| status | boolean |  |
| error | String |  |

# **content**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cusId | long | Customer ID |
| cusLastName | String | Customer Last Name |
| cusFirstName | String | Customer First Name |
| cusAddress | String | Customer address 1 |
| cusPostcode | String | Customer postcode |
| cusCity | String | Customer city |
| cusState | String | Customer state |
| cusCountry | String | Customer Country |
| cusEmail | String |  |
| cusContact | String |  |
| cusJoinDate | String |  |
| name | String | Customer full name |
| address | String | Customer full address |
| cards | Object Array |  |

# **cards**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cdId | long |  |
| cdNo | String |  |
| cdType | string |  |

request.description:
# **Request Fields**

# **Object**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Compulsory** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| lastName | String | Y | Customer Last Name |
| firstName | String | Y | Customer First Name |
| address | String |  | Customer address |
| postcode | String |  | Customer postcode |
| city | String |  | Customer city |
| state | String |  | Customer state |
| country | String |  | Customer country |
| email | String | Y | Customer personal email |
| contact | String |  | Customer contact no |
| joinDate | String |  | Customer join date |
| card | Object Array |  | Card Info |

# **card (Optional)**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| no | String | Card No |
| type | String | Type of card (e.g. M/V stand for Mastercard or Visa) |

# **Response Fields**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| content | Object |  |
| messages | String\[\] |  |
| status | boolean |  |
| error | String |  |

# **content**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cusId | long | Customer ID |
| cusLastName | String | Customer Last Name |
| cusFirstName | String | Customer First Name |
| cusAddress | String | Customer address 1 |
| cusPostcode | String | Customer postcode |
| cusCity | String | Customer city |
| cusState | String | Customer state |
| cusCountry | String | Customer Country |
| cusEmail | String |  |
| cusContact | String |  |
| cusJoinDate | String |  |
| name | String | Customer full name |
| address | String | Customer full address |
| cards | Object Array |  |

# **cards**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cdId | long |  |
| cdNo | String |  |
| cdType | string |  |

request.description:
# **Request Fields**

# **Object Array**

StartFragmentEndFragment

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Compulsory** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| ctName | String | Y | Name of the card |
| ctCode | String | Y | Card code |

# **Response Fields**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| content | Object |  |
| messages | String\[\] |  |
| status | boolean | result status, true is success, false is failed |
| error | String | If status is false this will display error message |

# **content (Object Array)**

StartFragment

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| ctId | long | Customer ID |
| ctName | String | Customer Last Name |

| cdNo | String |  |
| cdType | string |  |

request.description:
# **Response Fields**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| content | Object Array |  |
| messages | String\[\] |  |
| status | boolean |  |
| error | String |  |

# **content (Object Array)**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cusId | long | Customer ID |
| cusLastName | String | Customer Last Name |
| cusFirstName | String | Customer First Name |
| cusAddress | String | Customer address 1 |
| cusPostcode | String | Customer postcode |
| cusCity | String | Customer city |
| cusState | String | Customer state |
| cusCountry | String | Customer Country |
| cusEmail | String |  |
| cusContact | String |  |
| cusJoinDate | String |  |
| name | String | Customer full name |
| address | String | Customer full address |
| cards | Object Array |  |

# **cards**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cdId | long |  |
| cdNo | String |  |
| cdType | string |  |

request.description:
StartFragment

# **Request Fields**

# **Object Array**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Compulsory** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| lastName | String | Y | Customer Last Name |
| firstName | String | Y | Customer First Name |
| address | String |  | Customer address |
| postcode | String |  | Customer postcode |
| city | String |  | Customer city |
| state | String |  | Customer state |
| country | String |  | Customer country |
| email | String | Y | Customer personal email |
| contact | String |  | Customer contact no |
| joinDate | String |  | Customer join date |
| card | Object Array |  | Card Info |

# **card**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| no | String | Card No |
| type | String | Type of card (e.g. M/V stand for Mastercard or Visa) |

# **Response Fields**

| **Parameter** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| content | Object |  |
| messages | String\[\] |  |
| status | boolean |  |
| error | String |  |
